title: @RIOT "Your ranked team has been disbanded"
body:
Our ranked team was just disband because it was inactive and someone else took our name...

WE COULDN'T MAKE IT ACTIVE AGAIN BECAUSE WE CANT EVEN PLAY TEAMS!!! 

how is this fair??
we wanted to play our team so it wouldn't be disbanded, but we couldn't because of your new system, so how is it fair that our team can be disbanded while we cant even play it??

replies.body:
Hey man,

can you send in a support ticket about this and pass me the ticket number. I will look into it, but no promises at this point.

Hey Marauder, I'm so sorry i didn't see your message! i only just saw it now so I'm really sorry this is late.
the number is #20352623

anything you could do would be great, but if theres nothing you can do, then thanks anyway :)

Hey,

I will see what I can do. Sorry I can't make any promises as of yet but I will keep you updated.

Thanks man :) 

thats all i could ask, thanks so much, and if it doesn't work out then thats just the way it is.
